thread.section_title: Hotel & Spa La Belle Juliette - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Awesome Hotel!
thread.title_full: Awesome Hotel! - Review of Hotel & Spa La Belle Juliette, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Josef Z
title: Awesome Hotel!
text:
If you want to spend some days in Paris and enjoy kind of historic flair, La Belle Juliette is one of the greatest places to be. Rooms are small, breakfast is enjoyed in a living room and dinner... well I propose to go to dinner elsewhere. But! All the time you will be reminded of Madame Juliette, one of the most beautiful and brainy ladies at here time.
We loved those days in Paris!
